actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Federal Trade Commission to conduct a broad scale investigation of all activities within its jurisdiction which involve condominiums and condominium projects, and to take such actions and make such recommendations as may be necessary or appropriate under the law to provide more adequate protection for purchasers and owners of condominiums.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Trade Commission to conduct a broad-scale investigation of all activities within its jurisdiction which involve condominiums and condominium projects. Directs the Commission to prosecute violations of those laws relating to such projects as are under the jurisdiction of the Commission. Directs the Commission to submit a report to Congress on the investigation required by this Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Federal Trade Commission to conduct a broad scale investigation of all activities within its jurisdiction which involve condominiums and condominium projects, and to take such actions and make such recommendations as may be necessary or appropriate under the law to provide more adequate protection for purchasers and owners of condominiums.
